title: Yoram Gross interview collection
description: Contains: 1.'Channel 9 News' item: Blinky Bill 2. 'TVTV' program (Sept. 1993): Yoram Gross, Blinky Bill, Guy Cross, Robyn Moore, Robert Smit 3. '7.30 Report' ABC: Keith Scott, Yoram Gross, Blinky BIll, Dot and the whale, Guy Cross 4. Dot & Kangaroo, Athol Henry, Animators, Dot goes to Hollywood 5. Guy Cross Film music 6. 'Channel 7 News' and 'A Current Affair' (June 1994): Blinky Bill versus Senator McGaurin 7. Ray Martin interviews Yoram Gross, Dot and Keeto 8. 'Small Business Show' Channel 9: Yoram Gross interview, Sandra Gross interview 9. News article on the Childrens Film Festival 10. Childrens Film Festival interview with Yoram Gross 11. Channel 9 News: Childrens Film Festival, Bob Hawke, Guy Cross 12 'Today Show' Channel 9: Interview with Yoram Gross, Around the World with Dot 13. 'Today Show' Channel 9 (May 1985): Interview with Yoram Gross, Epic (poor image quality) 14. 'C'mon Kids': making Dot & Keeto with Athol Henry 15. '11am' Channel 7: Dot & Keeto, Around the World with Dot, Dot Goes to Hollywood, Sarah 16. 'Tutti' SBS: Blinky Bill, Sarah, Bandstand 17. 'Midday with Derryn Hinch': Robyn Moore interview
